dangerZone.title: Permanently delete this account
dangerZone.description: Remove your profile and cancel any active orders linked to it.
dangerZone.deleteDataNotice: All saved details (name, email, phone, addresses, and preferences) will be erased.
dangerZone.orderCancelNotice: Any open or pending orders on this account will be cancelled automatically.
dangerZone.irreversible: This action is immediate and cannot be undone.

confirmDialog.title: Confirmation required
confirmDialog.deleteBody: We will erase your saved profile and cancel any pending orders. You will need to create a new account to return.

support.title: Need help or have feedback?

aiConversations.title: AI Conversations

account.support_description: Share your opinion or get help

account.helper_text: One central hub for all your account needs: profile settings, payments, orders, and support. Consistent design across all pages for a seamless experience.
